title: PTDC named official tourism partner for upcoming FIDIC conference
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 19 (APP):The Pakistan Tourism Development Corporation (PTDC) has been designated as the official tourism partner for the upcoming FIDIC Asia Pacific Mid-Year conference scheduled to take place from 15 to 17 July here.
The Association of Consulting Engineers Pakistan (ACEP) under the umbrella of FIDIC Asia Pacific will organize three-day prestigious international forum to convene senior representatives from the engineering and infrastructure sectors, including leading global consulting firms, multilateral development institutions such as the Asian Development Bank (ADB) and the World Bank, as well as regional policymakers and stakeholders, said a press release.
As the Official Tourism Partner, PTDC will play a key role in highlighting the country’s diverse and rich tourism landscape to an international audience. This strategic collaboration is aimed at promoting Pakistan as a dynamic destination for global tourism, investment, and cross-sectoral engagement.
“We are honored to be partnering with FIDIC Asia Pacific and ACEP for this important event,” said a PTDC spokesperson. “This partnership is not only underscored the growing global interest in Pakistan’s tourism potential but also reaffirms our commitment in facilitating international dialogue and development through cultural and economic exchange.”
Through its participation, PTDC will provide delegates with curated tourism experiences, destination insights, and opportunities to explore the country’s cultural heritage, natural beauty, and hospitality sector.
The event will serve as a vital platform for positioning Pakistan on the global map as a center for both sustainable tourism and international collaboration.
